messages.subject: Family Fun and More at the 4th Annual UWG!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Just 7 ½ wks until the awesome UWG begins, so be sure to register soon while rooms are still available! WHAT:   4th Annual Unschoolers Waterpark
messages.messageBody:
Just 7 ½ wks until the awesome UWG begins, so be sure to register soon while rooms are still available! WHAT:   4th Annual Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering (UWG) WHERE:  Kalahari Indoor Waterpark Resort (USA’s largest Indoor Waterpark)                 Sandusky, Ohio  http://www.kalahariresorts.com/oh/parks/%c2%a0WHEN:%c2%a0%c2%a0%c2%a0May 15 - 20, 2011 EVENTS:  Pool Party, Carnival, Talent Show, Mom’s Night Out, Kids’                  Marketplace, Movie Night, Funshops, and MUCH more! TALKS:   Pat Farenga - Keynote Opening Speaker, along with lots of other                 informative and inspirational unschooling speakers! FAMILY FUN:  Along with being at America’s largest indoor waterpark,                  nearby are lots of family fun attractions: including Cedar Point               Amusement Park (rated #1 roller coaster park in the
world!),               T. Edison Birthplace Museum, NASA -Sandusky (home to world’s                largest vacuum chamber),  and much more! For further info and to register,  please join our yahoo group at:http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/
[Please help us spread the word by passing this on to all your unschooly friends and groups. (THANKS!) ]
~ Carol - UWG Coordinatorhttp://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/http://ugoevent.com/index.php



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
